author: CoffeeBrickMan
title: Quick Mini Review
review:
Meltus is the first of the Series 4 Mixels of the Infernites Tribe.This is the second appearance of the Infernites Tribe, they were the first tribe of Series 1. I missed Series 1, so I can't really make comparisons.

Meltus looks great - his head has the look of a dragon (something I'm a fan of - see  my review of 31032!). He has a great face, with excellent eyebrows.

Lots of red pieces, with dark red (New Dark Red) and transparent orange decorative bits. Moderate articulation with ball&sockets and clips.

Quick build time 4½ minutes.

A variety of articulations, and a really great dragon head, make this a great Mixel, I like him and this tribe.

author: MixelMaker
title: My Favorite set I own
review:
I own 83 different sets, and out of all of them this one takes the cake.

 

The parts are amazing for the (used to be) price, and the playability is awesome. It makes a cool-looking Dinosaur and a Mixel at the same time. I originally bought this set for the Infernites Max, but I really like the way it came out!

 

Negatives: The pieces that hold the eyebrows up can be taken apart like once or twice before you have to buy a replacement. It breaks VERY easily.

Positives: Pretty much everything else.
